scripts.compile-riot: npx riot js/pascal-triangle.tag dist && npx riot js/triangle-item.tag dist
scripts.concat-js: npx concat-cli -f dist/riot.min.js dist/pascal-triangle.js dist/triangle-item.js dist/app.js -o dist/bundle_tmp.js
scripts.build: npm run minify-html && npm run compile-riot && npm run copy-js && npm run concat-js && npm run minify-js
scripts.postbuild: rm dist/riot.min.js && rm dist/pascal-triangle.js && rm dist/triangle-item.js && rm dist/app.js && rm dist/bundle_tmp.js
